summary: The module implements middleware that processes HTTP requests and responses to enforce common web standards in a Django application. It normalizes URLs (adding trailing slashes or "www" prefixes), blocks disallowed user‑agents, generates ETags for full‑page content to enable conditional GET handling, and monitors responses for broken external links, optionally sending notification emails to site managers.
business_intent: Provide a configurable, out‑of‑the‑box solution that enhances site reliability, SEO, and security by automatically correcting URLs, limiting unwanted crawlers, improving cache efficiency, and alerting administrators to broken links.
